member.name: IDxcBlobEncoding.GetEncoding
member.summary: Retrieve the encoding for this blob.
member.param: Pointer to a variable that will be set to TRUE if the encoding is known.
Pointer to a variable that will be set to the encoding used for this blob. If the encoding isn't known then pCodePage will be set to CP_ACP.

member.name: IDxcBlobEncoding
member.summary: A blob that might have a known encoding.
